title: Event Table
desc: A responsive event agenda featuring dynamic time slot rendering, modular SVG icon support, and full dark/light theme toggling based on system preferences and user interaction.</br></br> Special care was given to mobile UX:</br> Instead of keeping the table header sticky, a custom solution displays time slot information contextually during scroll, improving orientation without forcing the user to scroll back up.
